Act As.Description: This attribute allows setting the characteristics of the object whether it is Default / Action / Label / Config / On The Fly / External Action.

Parameters.Keywords: Action, Config, Default, External Action, Label, On The Fly

Act As.Name: Act As

Action.Name: Action

Collection.Description: It is used for temporary purpose while restoring/migrating/importing data and similar usage.This is mainly used to define the collection inside a User defined Object.
Collection.Name: Collection

Current Collection.Description: This attribute specifies a collection at object level.
Current Collection.Name: Current Collection

Current Report.Description: This attribute specifies a report at object level.
Current Report.Name: Current Report

Full Width.Description: If expression is evaluated to true, the first column of the object will occupy entire width of the table. It will not show any other columns.
Full Width.Name: Full Width

Local Formula.Description: This is used to specify a local formula within the Object.
Local Formula.Name: Local Formula

Storage.Description: It is used for temporary purpose while restoring/migrating/importing data and similar usage.This is mainly used to define the methods/storage of a User defined Object.

Parameters.Keywords: Aggregate, Amount, Date, DateTime, Due Date, Duration, FlagSet, Logical, Long, Number, NumSet, Quantity, Rate, Rate of Exchange, String, Sys Id, Time

Storage.Name: Storage

Use.Description: The USE keyword is used in a definition to reuse an existing definition.
Use.Name: Use
